review: The device is great with Amazon items (TV/Movies, music, photos), not very convenient with any of the other apps.  I don't have a Fire TV to compare to, but compared to Roku and Apple TV its not nearly as responsive or fast, but then its a lot smaller and cheaper.  The stick is great when you want to keep wiring to a minimum.

review: Only complaint is that the included remote is terrible. Install the Fire TV app on your smartphone and you'll have a much better experience.

review: Note that you do need to have "subscriptions", typically via a cable or satellite company account number, to content providers (HBO, ESPN, etc.) in order to get full access to their content via this device.  I have also found that the Stick will not provide access to US content when in Europe.  However, it will work in most US hotels that have WiFi and where the TVs have a HDMI port.
